inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

LRC, in pencil: [591]
markings: LRC below child's foot, stamped in black: unidentified symbol
medium: Black ink and gray wash on laid paper
provenance: David Loshak, Ann Arbor (in 1974). Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 4, 1985, no. 35, for £3, 568, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1985-d.2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Erminia and the Shepherds
